Text: Access Groups and Members for OResearch and Subfolders Cc Research Group is conducting an access audit for its directory and subfolders I would appreciate receiving a list of access groups and their members for the OResearch directory and subfolders If there were a way to list what kind of access each group has for each folder or at least which groups have Modify access it would be great I have already spoken with Sandra Hart who has begun the process Thank you for your assistance in our effort to maintain the integrity and security of our data Regards Martin Lin

oResearch access listfind attached an Excel workbook listing different access groups for Research I have marked some users for keeping and deleting Im not sure how you wish to proceed You can edit the list as you see fit Perhaps we can contact those who have particular groups eg Weather for updates on their list I am generally of the opinion that the lists should be as short as possible A directory that Lance and I share with the power group was deleted yesterday but nobody knows who did that I hope after this audit is done we are much less at risk of something that like happening again Thanks Martin
